body:
Hello, I'm having trouble buying Gold because it keeps saying "Your transaction couldn't be completed using the selected card" I'm using a MasterCard and I'm pretty sure that's supported. I currently have $31.09 in my paypal so I don't see why it wouldn't work.

Help me please :(

title: Having trouble paying for rank with Paypal

replies.body: If you'd like, I can call you on Skype and you could share your screen and show me.

replies.body: It might be because you're in India.
